sourceMeaningMnemonic: With a <radical>woman</radical>'s <radical>mouth</radical>, you have a <kanji>likeness</kanji> to me.
meaningInfo: Imagine someone's putting a woman's mouth over your mouth, looking at you, and commenting on your likeness. All it took was this woman's mouth.
readingMnemonic: You have a <kanji>likeness</kanji> to <reading>Jo</reading>-Anne (<ja>じょ</ja>) when you wear that mouth.
readingInfo: Jo-Anne popped her mouth off and put it on you. Indeed with that mouth on, you have an extreme likeness to her.
